title: Ten Big Toes and a Prince's Nose
description: Poor little princess... As soon as suitors caught a glimpse of her gigantic feet, they ran for the door. And in another kingdom, far far away, a kind prince had a similar maidens made a hasty retreat the moment they saw his gigantic nose! But a serendipitous meeting on a ski slope teaches this adorably flawed (and well-matched) pair an important   I am what I am and that's all right with me. I don't have to be different, I just have to be. I don't want to be somebody else. No sir-ree! I am what I am and that's all right with me.With whimsical surprises, lavish art, and a fantastical story about love and acceptance, this picture book will delight readers of any age.
author: Nancy Gow
